*RAMADHAN DAY 0️⃣1️⃣* 

 _SAHUR 🍲🥛_ 

 *Manzon ALLAH (ﷺ) Ya ce: "Madallah Da Dabino A Matsayin Abin Sahur Ga Mumini".* 

 _Abu Dawud Ya Ruwaito Albaniy Ya Ingantashi_ 

 *Manzon ALLAH (ﷺ)  Yayi Sahur Kuma Ya Kwaɗaitar Akan Yinsa. Dan Haka A Daure Ayi Sahur Ko Da Dabino Ne Ko Kurɓar Ruwane.* 

 *Lokacin Yin Sahur Lokaci Ne Mai Tsada, Don Haka A Ribaci Wannan Lokaci A Yawaita Istigfari...* 
 
 _Kar A manta Da Azkar Ɗin Safiya Bayan An Idar Da Sallar Asubahi._ 

B̤A̤R̤K̤A̤  D̤A̤  A̤S̤ṲB̤A̤

3: BARKAN KU DA SHAN RUWA ALLAH YA BAMU LADAN AZUMTAR RAMADAN KAREEM BAKI DAYA

8: Barkan ku da safiya fatan dai antashi lafiya ya azumi Allah yasa mai lada mukeyi Allah amen
9: BARKAN KU DA RANA AZUMIN NAN SAI DA RUWA WALLAHI
